1665580.name: Grayscale
1665580.description: Grayscale is a story driven, 2D puzzle platformer centered around the main character Faela. The game follows her story as she attempts to save her world from its own instability. take advantage of the bizarre plane swapping physics of their world to change everything around you and progress, but be careful that this same strategy isn't deployed against you by the local wildlife. You will face many dangers that have long since adapted to this world's fracturing, take care that you do not become their victim.
1665580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
